...

Manifesto

08/10/24

Hello dear reader,

It's been a while. Sometimes I get so caught up with things I forget about my talents. Like webdev, guitar playing, rollerskating.

I haven't been rollerskating or even skateboarding all year. Too hot, too tired, too worried about injuring myself. I honestly haven't eaten enough these past few months so that probably adds to it. Sorry for the mini vent, it's just...been 7 months and. I've changed for the better, I have, but I'm still struggling and that's hard to deal with.

I know I'll be ok. I'm grateful and so happy I'm still here with so many people I love. with so many THINGS I love.

I've been doing LOTS of reading since getting to work takes an hour and change so I have 3 hours of reading a day basically. I've been wanting to create again. In all the art forms I love. Not all the art I create I want to share, but I want to write myself a little manifesto to remember why I create. I never want to lose sight of it again because 'oh I need money'. Because of community, family, and my own drive I will survive. To truly live, I want to make and do things for myself! Even if it ends up sucking, that's ok.

What even is a manifesto?

Until next time...
